You cannot talk to the living or vote. > > Passive 2: Super Rotting: Dies 2 nights after being revived > > Night Ability 1: Protection: Protect an Unseen member and prevent others from visiting, 2 use > > Night Ability 2: Frenzy: Guarantees the Assassin will kill the target, 1 use > > The Mastermind has a new day ability called Member From The Dead, this ability will bring back a dead Unseen member into a Death Enforcer > > Feedback/suggestions are appreciated, Also sorry for posting so much

item.title: {Class Suggestion} The Death Enforcer {Unseen, Support}
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Okay it’s a good addition don’t pay any attention to what I am about to say FOR this addition. People need to be careful about adding stuff that would protect the unseen/cult. Nerfs all the BD roles that can kill them

item.description:

Interesting idea though

Yea, I posted this before I saw it

Will make it live for 2 days though I don’t want to nerf it to much

item.title: {Class Suggestion} The Death Enforcer {Unseen, Support}
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
They’re trying to get rid of interaction with the dead right now. This won’t be implemented although it’s an interesting idea. Probably a bit too powerful though, I would only make him love 2 days but be able to guard twice or make the assassin’s attack bypass immunity(but not healing/knights/bears, so it’s a nerfed version) and guard once or just make him only be able to use one ability but live until he does.

Read full topic

item.title: {Class Suggestion} The Death Enforcer {Unseen, Support}
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
The Death Enforcer, Unseen, Support

This class is a unique class

Passive 1: Undead: You will appear dead to all other players. You cannot talk to the living or vote.

Passive 2: Super Rotting: Dies 2 nights after being revived

Night Ability 1: Protection: Protect an Unseen member and prevent others from visiting, 2 use

Night Ability 2: Frenzy: Guarantees the Assassin will kill the target, 1 use

The Mastermind has a new day ability called Member From The Dead, this ability will bring back a dead Unseen member into a Death Enforcer

Feedback/suggestions are appreciated, Also sorry for posting so much

Read full topic
